title: Barbie Movie Soundtrack #5: Barbie as The Island Princess
description:
As of March 2009, there are six unique soundtracks released for the Barbie films. I am in the process of obtaining and sharing them all. I will also continue to collect as more soundtracks are released.
I previously listed there being twelve, but I recently discovered they are German releases of radio plays. I don't think I'll be obtaining those in the near future...my German is nonexistent.

A cute movie with some great songs. I Need To Know stands out strong with a beautiful melody and a catchy chorus while Right Here In My Arms is a precious lullaby that will bring tears to my eyes if I'm not careful.
I've also added the sheet music and song lyrics that can found on the DVD.

Barbie as The Island Princess
Track Listing:
1. Here On My Island
2. Right Here In My Arms
3. A Brand New Shore
4. I Need To Know
5. Love Is For Peasants
6. Right Here In My Arms: Greenhouse
7. At The Ball
8. The Rat Song
9. Always More
10. Right Here In My Arms: Reunion
11. When We Have Love
12. I Need To Know (pop version)

Enjoy, everyone! A thank you would be wonderful. :D


***
I am missing these albums. If anyone has them and would like to help complete this collection, I would be greatly appreciative.
